sentences.sentence: The complete story of why the center of my ferrule has no black nickel on it would take pages to explain.
sentences.translation: 为什么在我的金属箍的中间部分没有黑镍这个问题，就得用上好多页纸才能回答清楚。

sentences.sentence: A ferrule and eraser are crimped into place on each pencil.
sentences.translation: 金属环把橡皮头固定到每一根铅笔上。

sentences.sentence: Its ferrule followed lightly on the path, squealing at his heels.
sentences.translation: 手杖上的金属包头沿着小径轻快地跟随着他，在他的脚后跟吱吱作响。
